failure.message: Hardcoded secret (credential leakage) at line 8: API_KEY should not be hardcoded.
Insecure DB usage (SQL injection via string concat) at line 17: Use parameterized queries instead of string concatenation.
Command injection via unsanitized input at line 27: User input should be sanitized before passing to exec.
Dangerous eval on JSON body (remote code execution risk) at line 35: Avoid using eval on user-provided content.
Hardcoded secret usage at line 45: Avoid exposing sensitive information even in truncated form.
